name: StudyingRelaxingMusic
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: If you are studying and you want to feel relaxed while reading and perusing your books,laptop or smartphones,then this relaxing music will surely relieve your mind. It helps to get your mind relaxed so that you will be able to absorb all that you are studying. Just ask Alexa open flash briefing and you get to hear this relaxing music for studying.
